channel.title: Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju on John Cosio
channel.description: Recent content in Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju on John Cosio

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju
item.description: Model Kit: SD Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju Trying something different with the layouts. Also playing around with changing the Gundam’s color with this one. Before After A quick edit with colors. Changing from red to blue and the guns near the eyes. More practice with glowing things like the gun scopes and eye. Sometime in the future I would like to paint this.

item.description: Model Kit: SD Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju Trying something different with the layouts. Also playing around with changing the Gundam’s color with this one. item.title: Build Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju
item.description: Completed another SD kit. Getting the hang of it now. My brother has been building an HG kit and he said it took him around 3 hours or more so looking at 2 more SDs then going for an HG or straight to my MG on stand by.
